response.overview: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages and, as he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.
response.title: The Father

titles.title: ความทรงจำ ความรัก ความลืม

release_dates.note: 全国艺术电影放映联盟专线上映 a National Alliance of Arthouse Cinemas release

results.name: The Father Conversation with Olivia Colman & Anthony Hopkins
